thread.title: Animals keep dying under Mayor de Blasio’s watch
thread.title_full: Animals keep dying under Mayor de Blasio’s watch | New York Post

author: Natalie O'Neill
title: Animals keep dying under Mayor de Blasio’s watch
text:
SEE ALSO 
Runaway bull dies after mad dash through Queens 0:0 The “steaks” were high — and he lost. A runaway... The Queens runaway bull joins a groundhog and a deer as high-profile animal deaths on Mayor de Blasio’s watch.
First was Staten Island Charlotte, the feisty marmot who died of internal injuries after Hizzoner dropped her on Groundhog Day 2014 . 
Next came Lefty the one-antlered white-tailed deer, who swam to Harlem in search of a mate but died of stress while in captivity at an Animal Care & Control center in December 2016.
